animal.question: I meow and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I purr when you pet me.
🐾 I have soft paws.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I protect your house.
🎾 I like to play fetch.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in a field.
⚫ I have black and white spots.
🔔 Farmers sometimes put bells on me.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and strong.
🚿 I can spray water with my trunk.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I am a type of bird.
🟠 I have orange or yellow feet.
🍞 People sometimes feed me bread.

animal.question: I have a mane and roar very loudly. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am known as the king of the jungle.
🦁 I live in Africa.
🍖 I am a carnivore.

animal.question: I hop and have a pouch to carry my baby. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am from Australia.
🌿 I eat plants.
🦘I can jump very high.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest animal.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.
🤎 I have brown spots.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and have sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator.
🌊 I live in salt water.
🐟 Other fish are sometimes afraid of me.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and sometimes hiss. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I can be venomous or non-venomous.
🐁 I eat mice and other small animals.
🌿 I blend in with my environment.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔ You need an umbrella when I am falling.
🌧️ Puddles form when I'm here.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I help plants grow.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm very bright.
🔥 I can make you feel very warm.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep.
☁️ I can bring rain or sunshine.
🌬️ The wind pushes me around.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of tiny crystals.
☃️ You can make a snowman out of me.
🧤 You need gloves when I'm around.

weather.question: I am strong and I can blow things around. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make leaves fly.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
💨 Sometimes I whisper, sometimes I howl.

weather.question: I am very hot and bright, and I come with thunder. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am a flash of light.
🌩️ I am dangerous, stay inside when I'm around.
💡 I am like a giant spark.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I make a booming sound.
👂 You can hear me from far away.
⛈️ I come during a storm.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am like tiny ice balls.
🤕 Ouch! It can hurt if I hit you.
⚾ I can be small or large.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spins around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can knock down trees.
🏠 You should take cover when I’m near.
🌀 I look like a swirling funnel.

weather.question: I measure how hot or cold something is outside. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I have numbers on me.
☀️ I can tell you if you need a jacket or not.
❄️ I can tell you if it might snow.
